players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Charlie is the mafioso and I investigated him. Trust me."
Charlie: "I have nothing to hide and trust everyone in this game. Let's work together to find the real mafia among us."
You: "I want everyone to know that Charlie is the mafioso based on my investigation. I suggest we focus our efforts on protecting the villagers and finding any other potential mafia members."
